comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: By weakness and defeat He won a glorious crown, trod all our foes beneath His feet by being trodden down.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Bless, bless the Conqu'ror slain, slain in His victory; who lived, who died, who lives again — For thee, His church, for thee!
